name: Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah
bio: Senior defense counsel specializing in criminal and constitutional law. Prominent figure in Malaysian legal circles with extensive experience in high-profile cases.

name: Hisyam Teh Poh Teik
bio: Criminal defense lawyer with expertise in financial crimes and corporate defense matters. Member of the defense legal team in several 1MDB-related cases.

name: Harvinderjit Singh
bio: Criminal defense advocate with practice focused on serious crimes and complex financial matters. Known for meticulous case preparation.

name: Datuk Jagjit Singh Sidhu
bio: Senior criminal defense counsel with extensive High Court experience. Lead defense counsel in several high-profile corruption cases.
